sentences.en: All at once there was a deafening roar from the warship.
sentences.cn: 战船突然发出震耳欲聋的炮声.

sentences.en: And we provide them with the services of the toughest warship in the known universe.
sentences.cn: 我们会给他们提供在宇宙中的军舰服务.

sentences.en: At the same time sounds like thunder rocked the warship.
sentences.cn: 与此同时,战舰还被一种雷鸣般的声音震撼着.

sentences.en: He is serving on a warship in the Pacific.
sentences.cn: 他在太平洋海域的一艘军舰上服役.

sentences.en: I'm the living embodiment of a warship, and I can't talk to you without getting tongue - tied.
sentences.cn: 我是一艘战舰的生命体化身, 除非把舌头连接在一起,否则我是不能和你说的.

sentences.en: That warship laid up long ago.
sentences.cn: 那艘军舰很久以前就退役了.

sentences.en: The awfully awkward warship is warned not to be awarded war reward.
sentences.cn: 那艘非常拙劣的军舰受到不给予战争报酬的警告.
孩子们参观了那艘军舰.

sentences.en: The enemy warship has caught fire.
The new class of warship was built to hand out the punishment.
sentences.cn: 这条新等级战舰是为了痛击敌人而建造的.

sentences.en: The perfectly geometrical simulation module model of warship wake was established.
sentences.cn: 摘要建立了较完备的尾流仿真模型,给出了尾流空穴模型和机动目标尾流的正确描述.

sentences.en: The Queen is to launch a new warship today.
sentences.cn: 今天女王要主持新军舰下水仪式.

sentences.en: The submarine had had time to submerge before the warship could approach.
sentences.cn: 潜水艇没等军舰靠近就及时潜入水下了。

sentences.en: The warship ought to be remanned right away.
sentences.cn: 这艘战舰应立即重新配备人员。

sentences.en: The warship was making towards the pier.
The warship was steaming at 20 knots.
sentences.cn: 这艘军舰(当时)以二十海里的时速航行着.

sentences.en: They saw a German submarine resurfacing near their warship.
sentences.cn: 他们看见一艘德国潜艇在离他们的战舰不远处重新露出水面。

words.tran_cn: 战争的；好战的；有战争危险的
战争，斗争；军事，战术；冲突，对抗，竞争
进行战争（war的现在分词形式）
军舰,战舰,炮艇,航空母舰,潜水艇

trans.tran_en: a ship with guns that is used in a war
